name: Dwarf, Pike Guard Captain
description: The Dwarf Pike Guard Captain is a stout warrior clad in plate armor, wielding a long pike and exhibiting a commanding presence on the battlefield.
memorable: Has inspiring abilities that bolster allies' combat effectiveness.
goals: To control the battlefield strategically and support allied troops.
relations: Often commands pike guards and can be found with a unit of soldiers.
environment: Typically found in fortifications or military encampments.
strengths: High durability and damage resistance to poison, capable of tactical buffs and commanding presence.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity makes them vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Can perform powerful pike attacks with a significant range, dealing piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Not One Step Back! inspires allies, granting them immunity to fear and charmed effects.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive perception of 14.
skills: Has proficiency in Intelligence and Wisdom saving throws.
additional_information: Grants half cover to allies within proximity against ranged attacks.
Can make opportunity attacks when allies deal damage.
Uses strategic commands to bolster frontline defense.
Can brace its pike for advantage against incoming threats.
Specializes in battlefield control and support.

dwarf captain that boosts allies in combat
